ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: getting started
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh I have not even been able to find out the name for the component.  I think it is called a bleack coffin or black coffin or  some such. If anyone is
ygData.messageBody:
Heh I have not even been able to find out the name for the component. I
think it is called "a bleack coffin" or "black coffin" or some such. If
anyone is able to tell me what tthee name is I'll be eternally grateful and
will do my best to help you out in game if you are on the Saryn Server



Cynfyn MacCulloch 49 DESK
Halyburton Bearhugger 22BarbShm
Saltaque 12 HIEEnch
Qapmoc 11 HalfElfRngr
Oroblram 9HumanWar
Defender of the Faith
Saryn server
